channel.title: All on Truthmaker Semantics
channel.description: Recent content in All on Truthmaker Semantics

item.title: Exact Truthmakers
item.description: Unpublished Two Switches and Truthmaker Semantics Hüseyin Güngör Publication details Analyses the Two Stitches puzzle from Ciardelli, Champollion, and Zhang using Fine’s exact truthmaker semantics for counterfactuals from (Fine 2012b) Keywords: logic conditionals Unpublished manuscript https://www.academia.edu/42813176/Two_Switches_and_Truthmaker_Semantics The Whole Truth Stephan Krämer Publication details Formulates an account of what it means to give the “whole truth” and formally models it in exact truthmaker semantics.

item.title: Applications
item.description: Unpublished Two-Dimensional Truthmaker Semantics Hasen Khudairi Publication details Extends the framework of exact truthmaker semantics with the resources of two-dimensional semantics. Keywords: philosophy modality Unpublished manuscript https://philarchive.org/archive/KHUTTS-2 The Whole Truth Stephan Krämer Publication details Formulates an account of what it means to give the “whole truth” and formally models it in exact truthmaker semantics. Keywords: philosophy language exact truthmaking In: Outstanding Contributions to Logic: Kit Fine, edited by Federico LG Faroldi and Frederik Van De Putte.

item.title: Background
item.description: 2016 Hyperintensionality Iliana Gioulatou Publication details Compares various accounts of hyperintensional content. Ch. 5 contains a discussion of Fine’s approach. Keywords: philosophy exact truthmaking theory Master’s thesis at University of Amsterdam, Institute for Logic, Language,; Computation. http://www.illc.uva.nl/Research/Publications/Reports/MoL-2016-24.text.pdf 2013 Recent Work in Relevant Logic Mark Jago Publication details Contains a brief discussion of truthmakers and their relation to relevant logic (Restall 1996).

item.title: Inexact Truthmakers
item.description: 2021 Routley Star and Hyperintensionality Sergei Odintsov and Heinrich Wansing Publication details Compares HYPE to Heyting-Ockam logic. Contains a characterization of HYPE as identical to a modal system introduced by Moisil. From the perspective of truthmaker semantics, these results can be understood as results about (a certain kind of) inexact truthmaker semantics. Keywords: logic modality theory In: Journal of Philosophical Logic 50: 33-56 10.

item.title: Theory
item.description: 2021 Routley Star and Hyperintensionality Sergei Odintsov and Heinrich Wansing Publication details Compares HYPE to Heyting-Ockam logic. Contains a characterization of HYPE as identical to a modal system introduced by Moisil. From the perspective of truthmaker semantics, these results can be understood as results about (a certain kind of) inexact truthmaker semantics. Keywords: logic modality inexact truthmaking In: Journal of Philosophical Logic 50: 33-56 10.
